mapper.select:
SELECT a.seq , a.admin_seq , a.standard_seq , a.barcode , a.name_code_1 , a.name_code_2 , a.name_code_3 , a.name_code_4 , a.model_name , a.goods_group , a.goods_name_1 , a.goods_name_2 , a.standard , a.unit , a.unit_count , a.buy_com , b.name_1 AS buy_company_name , a.make_com , c.name AS make_company_name , a.part_count , a.buy_price , a.prime_price , a.buy_discount , a.customer_price , a.sell_price_1 , a.sell_price_2 , a.sell_price_3 , a.sell_price_4 , a.sell_price_5 , a.sell_price_6 , a.sell_price_7 , a.sell_price_8 , a.sell_price_9 , a.sell_price_10 , a.sell_price_11 , a.sell_price_12 , a.sell_price_13 , a.sell_price_14 , a.category , a.country , d.code_name AS country_name , a.discontinue , a.discontinue_dt , a.etc , a.buy_type , e.name AS buy_type_name , a.item_group_1 , a.item_group_2 , a.item_group_3 , a.item_group_4 , a.item_group_5 , f.code_name AS item_group_one_name , g.code_name AS item_group_two_name , h.code_name AS item_group_three_name , i.code_name AS item_group_four_name , j.code_name AS item_group_five_name , a.enter_dt , a.unit_type , a.goods_image_url_1 , a.goods_image_url_2 , a.brand , k.name AS brand_name , a.use_yn , a.del_yn , a.insert_dt , a.update_dt FROM tb_goods a LEFT OUTER JOIN tb_buy_company b ON a.buy_com = b.admin_code LEFT OUTER JOIN tb_make_com c ON a.make_com = c.admin_code LEFT OUTER JOIN tb_country d ON a.country = d.admin_code LEFT OUTER JOIN tb_buy_type e ON a.buy_type = e.admin_code LEFT OUTER JOIN tb_item_group_one f ON a.item_group_1 = f.admin_code LEFT OUTER JOIN tb_item_group_two g ON a.item_group_2 = g.admin_code LEFT OUTER JOIN tb_item_group_three h ON a.item_group_3 = h.admin_code LEFT OUTER JOIN tb_item_group_four i ON a.item_group_4 = i.admin_code LEFT OUTER JOIN tb_item_group_five j ON a.item_group_5 = j.admin_code LEFT OUTER JOIN tb_brand k ON a.brand = k.admin_code
WHERE 1=1
AND a.admin_seq = "${adminSeq}"

SELECT seq , admin_seq , goods_name_1 , standard , model_name FROM tb_goods WHERE 1=1
AND goods_name_1 LIKE "%${searchGoodsName}%"
AND model_name LIKE "%${searchModelName}%"
SELECT seq , admin_seq , model_name , standard FROM tb_goods WHERE model_name LIKE "%${searchModelName}%"
